name: Wizzy's Mansion
overview: Wizzy's Mansion was only available on the Power Pack and BBC Bonanza collections. An evil monster has established itself at the top of Wizzy's mansion. To get rid of it, Wizzy (who is an incompetent wizard) has to cast a spell. Unfortunately, he forgot how to cast the spell and as if that's not enough the pages of his spellbook are scattered around all his mansion. Help Wizzy to get the pages back to get rid of the monster!
